data.title: The now voyagers
data.meta_description: Once the exclusive preserve of the leisured classes, passenger cruises looked to be dead in the water with the advent of the jet age. Then shipping alliances set sail with huge facility-laden vessels that cater to the fantasies of the mass market
data.text:
Once the exclusive preserve of the leisured classes, passenger cruises looked to be dead in the water with the advent of the jet age. Then shipping alliances set sail with huge facility-laden vessels that cater to the fantasies of the mass market

AIRLINE CHIEF executives and hotel industry moguls must surely envy the unbridled success of the cruise shipping industry. The business has come from left field in the past 20 years to emerge as a remarkably profitable mass-market enterprise, all the more noteworthy considering the future of the passenger ship was all but written off when the jumbo jet took to the skies in 1969.

Loading...
